front.title: Scheduling Function One (SF1) for hop-by-hop Scheduling in 6tisch Networks

abstract.t: This document defines a 6top Scheduling Function called "Scheduling Function One" (SF1) to reserve, label and schedule the end-to-end resources hop-by-hop through the Distributed Resource Reservation Protocol(RSVP). SF1 uses the 6P signaling messages with a global TrackID to add or delete the cells in L2-bundles of isolated traffic flows.
